verses.text: \w Be|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* saviour, O God; \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* waters \w have|strong="H5921"\w* come \w in|strong="H5921"\w*, \w even|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* neck.

\w My|strong="H0935"\w* feet \w are|strong="H0430"\w* deep \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* soft earth, where \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* no support; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* deep \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w waves|strong="H4325"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w flowing|strong="H4325"\w* \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0935"\w* am tired \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* crying; \w my|strong="H0935"\w* throat \w is|strong="H0369"\w* burning: \w my|strong="H0935"\w* eyes \w are|strong="H0369"\w* wasted \w with|strong="H0935"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w God|strong="H0369"\w*.

Those \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* hate \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* without \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* greater \w in|strong="H0430"\w* number than \w the|strong="H7121"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* head; those \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w against|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, falsely desiring \w my|strong="H3615"\w* \w destruction|strong="H3615"\w*, \w are|strong="H5869"\w* very strong; \w I|strong="H5869"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* back what \w I|strong="H5869"\w* \w had|strong="H0430"\w* not taken \w away|strong="H3615"\w*.

O \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w see|strong="H0834"\w* \w how|strong="H0834"\w* foolish \w I|strong="H0834"\w* am; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* wrongdoing \w is|strong="H0834"\w* clear \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* hope \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* put \w to|strong="H0430"\w* shame \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w armies|strong="H3808"\w*: \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* low \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Israel.

\w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w been|strong="H0954"\w* wounded \w with|strong="H0430"\w* sharp words because \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H1245"\w*; \w my|strong="H1245"\w* face \w has|strong="H0430"\w* \w been|strong="H0954"\w* \w covered|strong="H0954"\w* \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w become|strong="H5375"\w* strange \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* brothers, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* man \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* country \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother's children.

\w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* fire \w with|strong="H1961"\w* passion \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* house; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* hard \w things|strong="H1961"\w* which \w are|strong="H1121"\w* said \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H2114"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* bitter weeping, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w going|strong="H5307"\w* without \w food|strong="H0398"\w*, \w were|strong="H5307"\w* \w turned|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w shame|strong="H2781"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* put \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* clothing \w of|strong="H5315"\w* grief, \w they|strong="H5315"\w* said evil \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H4912"\w* wonder \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* authority; \w a|strong="H1961"\w* song \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* who \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* strong drink.

But \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* me, let \w my|strong="H8354"\w* prayer be made \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3427"\w*, O Lord, \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3427"\w* time \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3427"\w* \w are|strong="H8179"\w* pleased; O God, give me an answer \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H8354"\w* great mercy, \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H8354"\w* salvation \w is|strong="H3427"\w* certain.

Take \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* grip \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* sticky earth, \w so|strong="H0589"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H6256"\w* go \w down|strong="H6256"\w* into \w it|strong="H3068"\w*; \w let|strong="H6256"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H0589"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* deep waters.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* covered \w by|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w flowing|strong="H4325"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*; \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w deep|strong="H4615"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* go over \w my|strong="H5337"\w* head, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* shut up \w in|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* underworld.

Give \w an|strong="H5921"\w* answer \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w*, O Lord; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* mercy \w is|strong="H6310"\w* good: \w be|strong="H0408"\w* turned \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* great pity.

Let \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6437"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* covered \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* servant, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* trouble; quickly \w give|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*.

Come \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* soul, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w its|strong="H3588"\w* salvation: \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* saviour, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0413"\w* have seen \w my|strong="H6299"\w* shame, \w how|strong="H0341"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H5315"\w* laughed \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H7126"\w* low; \w my|strong="H6299"\w* haters \w are|strong="H5315"\w* all \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3605"\w* broken \w by|strong="H3605"\w* bitter words, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* am \w full|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* grief; \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3605"\w* search \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w some|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* pity \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H5048"\w*, \w but|strong="H0859"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*; \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* comforter.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* gave \w me|strong="H3808"\w* poison \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H4672"\w* food; \w and|strong="H3820"\w* bitter wine \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H4672"\w* drink.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* table before \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* destruction; \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* feasts become \w a|strong="H5414"\w* net \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* eyes \w be|strong="H1961"\w* blind \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* see; \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* bodies \w for|strong="H1961"\w* ever \w be|strong="H1961"\w* shaking.

Let \w your|strong="H7200"\w* curse come \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*; let \w the|strong="H7200"\w* heat \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* wrath overtake \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.
Give \w their|strong="H5921"\w* houses \w to|strong="H5921"\w* destruction, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* let there be no one \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* tents.

\w Because|strong="H8074"\w* they \w are|strong="H0168"\w* cruel \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w* \w against|strong="H3427"\w* whom \w your|strong="H1961"\w* hand \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w*; they \w make|strong="H8074"\w* bitter \w the|strong="H1961"\w* grief \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* wounded \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*.

Let \w their|strong="H3588"\w* punishment \w be|strong="H3588"\w* increased; let \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* come \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* righteousness.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* names \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w taken|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* book \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* living, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* numbered \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* upright.

\w But|strong="H6662"\w* I am poor \w and|strong="H6662"\w* full \w of|strong="H5612"\w* sorrow; \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H6662"\w* \w by|strong="H6662"\w* \w your|strong="H5973"\w* salvation, O \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* give praise \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* name \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H0430"\w* song; \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* give glory \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H0430"\w* what \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* done.

This \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w more|strong="H1431"\w* pleasing \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* Lord than \w an|strong="H0430"\w* ox, \w or|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H0430"\w* young ox \w of|strong="H0430"\w* full growth.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* poor \w will|strong="H3068"\w* see \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H3190"\w*: \w you|strong="H3190"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* lovers \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w have|strong="H3068"\w* life.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* ears \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* Lord \w are|strong="H0430"\w* open \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w poor|strong="H6035"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* takes \w thought|strong="H3824"\w* \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* prisoners.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* heavens \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* seas, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* everything moving \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* saviour \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* builder \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* towns \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Judah; so \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H8064"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* resting-place \w and|strong="H0776"\w* heritage.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* seed \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w servants|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* part \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lovers \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* name \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* rest.
